title: Question regarding Blue Essence acquisition rates.
body:
I was just wondering if anyone knows (I know Riot does) what the Blue Essence acquisition rates/leveling rates are like at levels 150-175? and how do those rates compare to the old IP rates?

I don't care if Blue Essence rates are apparently slightly higher on average than the old IP rates at levels 30-39, everyone will only be at that level for a short while. What really matters is what the new leveling and Blue Essence system is going to be like in the longer term, ie levels 150-175+ where it levels out.

Before anyone jumps on the "you're just young and entitled, be happy with what you got, just play the game" bandwagon, all I'm asking for is accurate information here, nothing more.
